import React, { useState, useEffect, Fragment } from "react"; import { useHistory, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { bookSeats } from '../../action/Bookseat'; // import PassengerDetail from "./passangerDetails"; import { getBusStatus } from '../../action/busStatus'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; const BookTicket = ({ bookSeats, match, busStatus: { loading, status }, getBusStatus }) => { useEffect(() => { getBusStatus(match.params.busId); }, getBusStatus[match.params.busId]); const [name, setName] = useState([]); const [email, setEmail] = useState([]); const [phone, setPhone] = useState([]); const [age, setAge] = useState([]); const [gender, setGender] = useState([]); const [isok, setIsok] = useState("false"); const [seatNumber, setSeatnumber] = useState([]); const travelDate = localStorage.getItem("travelDate"); const history = useHistory(); const getSeatNumber = (e, isok) => { let newSeat = e.target.value; console.log("seat", newSeat) if (seatNumber.includes(newSeat)) { setSeatnumber(seatNumber.filter((seat) => seat !== newSeat)); } else { setSeatnumber([...seatNumber, newSeat]) } if (isok == false) { setIsok(true) } }; const Gender = (e, isok) => { const { value } = e.target; console.log("gender", value) setGender(gender.concat(value)); }; const PassengerName = (e, isok) => { e.preventDefault(); let value = e.target.value; console.log("name", value) if (!value) { return setName("name is required")} else { setName(name.concat(value))} }; const PassengerEmail = (e, isok) => { e.preventDefault(); let value = e.target.value; console.log("email", value) if (!value) { return setEmail("Email is required")} else { setEmail(email.concat(value)) } }; const PassengerPhone = (e, isok) => { e.preventDefault(); let value = e.target.value; console.log("phone", value) if (!value) { return setPhone("Phone no. is required") } else { setPhone(phone.concat(value)) } }; const PassengerAge = (e, isok) => { e.preventDefault(); let value = e.target.value; console.log("Age", value) if (!value) { return setAge("Age is required") } else { setAge(age.concat(value)) } } const SubmitDetails = (e, isok)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const passengers = [] console.log("details", passengers) for (let i = 0; i < seatNumber.length; i++){ const newSeat = seatNumber[i] if (name[newSeat] || age[newSeat] || gender[newSeat] !== "Empty"){ passengers.push({ name: name[newSeat], age: age[newSeat], gender: gender[newSeat] }) } else { return alert("Please fill all the details")} } let userData = { seats_no: seatNumber, passengers, journeyDate: travelDate, email, contactNo: phone } bookSeats(match.params.busId, userData) } const isBooked = (seat) =>{ if (!loading){ return status.hasOwnProperty(seat) ? seat : "booked" } } return (
Please select seats
{ setIsok(true) getSeatNumber(e) }}>
{isok == "false" ? "" :

Seat No

PassengerName(e)} placeholder="Enter Name" />

PassengerAge(e)} placeholder="Enter Age" />

PassengerPhone(e)} placeholder="Enter Phone Number" /> PassengerEmail(e)} placeholder="Enter Email" />
Gender(e)} />
Gender(e)} />
Submit onClick={(e) => SubmitDetails(e)}
}
) } BookTicket.propTypes = { bookSeats: PropTypes.func.isRequired, getBusStatus: PropTypes.func.isRequired, busStatus: PropTypes.func }; const mapStateToProps = state => ({ busStatus: state.busStatus }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, { bookSeats, getBusStatus })(BookTicket);
